replies.bodyText: I've seen many issues which did not stick to the prescribed format being approved, as they were critical. Hence, I felt it would be better to have a bit less assertive tone here. If you don't feel this to be okay, I'll be more than happy to revert it.

please revert this, unfortunately it is critical, only maintainers can create issue that is not following format. Unfortunately there are a exceptions from this rule, but it is decision of maintainers to keep bug report or not.
This line is for bug report, it should follow format in 99% cases, and we are closing issues if author is not willing to do this.
